languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, должно быть, вы заметили мою... минутную слабость. Прошу прощения за эту вспышку".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, должно быть, вы заметили мою... минутную слабость. Прошу прощения за эту вспышку".
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, должно быть, вы заметили мою... минутную слабость. Прошу прощения за эту вспышку".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you have noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for this outburst."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: 「陛下、ひょっとしてお気づきに…一瞬動揺してしまいました。感情を爆発させてしまい、失礼いたしました」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ひょっとしてお気づきに…一瞬動揺してしまいました。感情を爆発させてしまい、失礼いたしました」
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: “大人，您或许注意到了我刚刚的……一时失态，请您原谅我的无礼。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您或许注意到了我刚刚的……一时失态，请您原谅我的无礼。”
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'imagine que vous avez remarqué mon... émoi. Veuillez me pardonner cet instant de faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, j'imagine que vous avez remarqué mon... émoi. Veuillez me pardonner cet instant de faiblesse. »
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puede que se haya percatado de mi momento de debilidad. Le pido disculpas».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puede que se haya percatado de mi momento de debilidad. Le pido perdón».
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, vielleicht ist Euch meine ... vorübergehende Schwäche aufgefallen. Verzeiht diesen Ausbruch."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, vielleicht ist Euch meine ... vorübergehende Schwäche aufgefallen. Verzeiht diesen Ausbruch."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, galiba... Boş bulunmuşluğumu sezdiniz. Feveranımı bağışlayın."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, perhaps you noticed my... momentary weakness. My apologies for my outburst."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, galiba... Boş bulunmuşluğumu sezdiniz. Feveranımı bağışlayınız."
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
